version_description:
- We have redesigned your profile view
- Minor bugfixes

- Swipe to navigate between menu items
- Bug fixes

Bug fixes

P.S If you like our app, please don't hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! We read and listen to all of them. The update contains:

* Color theme picker
* Added French Translations
* Fixed calendar import bug with timezones
* Fixed bug with week not starting on the right day

We have so many great features coming very soon. Next being flexible activities without start and end time. So stay tuned!
P.S. if you like our app, please don’t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! We read and listen to all of them. The update contains:

* Bug fixes

We have so many great features coming very soon. Next being flexible activities without start and end time. So stay tuned!
P.S. if you like our app, please don’t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

The update contains:
* New app+watch feature: flexible activities

[Visual changes]
* My day: To do anytime & Planned activities
* My day: Re-design of activity cards
* Right now: supporting multiple ongoing activities

It’s no exaggeration that we have been looking SO MUCH forward to sharing this release with you! A lot of hard work, love, and tears have been put into this new feature. Today we are launching flexible activities in Tiimo.

It means you can now make activities with a duration, and simply press start now when it fits you. You can also pause flexible activities and start them again when it fits. Dont worry - you can still use tiimo exactly like you did before, planning activities in a timed schedule. But now you have the option to not set a specific time for certain activities as well!

It means you can have many activities ongoing at the same time. That is why we have added a little thumbnail for “Right now” of your ongoing activities so you can switch in focus between different activities.

We’ve made some visual changes to the activity card in My Day as well. Icons are moved to the right side so that you quickly browse through your day visually with activities and checklist items.

Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! We read and listen to all of them. We have so many great features coming very soon. Next being a new and improved routine system, and more usability updates. So stay tuned!

P.S. if you like our app, please don’t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

Thank you for giving flexible activities such a warm welcome!

We are now ready with the next update. It includes: 
*Bug fix: Time zone issues 
*Bug fix: Widget - activity with checklist layout is now displaying correctly.
 *Bug fix: Checklist didn’t update UI immediately on phone and watch.
*New: Change profile name
*New: Add new profile

Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! We read and listen to all of them. We have so many great features coming very soon. Next being a new and improved routine system, and more usability updates. So stay tuned!

P.S. if you like our app, please don’t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

Dear wonderful Tiimo users! Thank you for all the kind words you’re passing along to us through customer support, reviews and on social media. It means so much to us hearing from you! Thank you for reaching out regarding issues you’re experiencing as well. We’re working as fast as we can to make the app better. Stay tuned!

This update contains:
+ New: re-ordering flexible activities. Now you can decide on the order of your activities “To do anytime” by dragging and dropping.
+ New: soft deletion of activities. This means when you delete an activity from your schedule, it will still appear in your library to be used another time.
+ New: Japanese version of the app is out! こんにちは！(Hi!).
+ New: added the option to play/resume/restart by swiping left on an activity.

+ Fixed: two bugs in widgets.
+ Fixed: bug for checking/unchecking checklist items.

Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! We read and listen to all of them. We have so many great features coming very soon. Next being a new and improved routine system. So stay tuned!

P.S. if you like our app, please don’t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

Welcome to all the new users!

This update includes:
+ Bug fix: Users being logged out (error 401)
+ Bug fix: Error when checking and unchecking checklists (Error 429)
+ Bug fix: Getting out of delete icon mode
+ Bug fix: Ignoring save when asked to save a repeating activity
+ Bug fix: Error in uploading own icon
+ Bug fix: Deleting recent activity if it was deleted in the my day view

We’re working hard to make the app better all the time. We have many great features coming very soon. Next is a new and improved routine system. Stay tuned!

Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! We read and listen to all of them.

P.S. if you like our app, please don’t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!

Welcome to all the new users!

This update includes:
- Improved create user experience.
- More user friendly error messages.
- Fixing bug on iPad split screen.

We are so proud and excited to announce that Apple is featuring Tiimo as ‘One to Watch’ globally across the App Store and apple.com.

We’re working hard to make the app better all the time. We have many great features coming very soon. Next up is a new and improved routine feature. Stay tuned!

Thanks for all your feedback and ideas! We read and listen to all of them.
P.S. if you like our app, please don’t hesitate to rate and review us. It means the world to us!
